FuncDef:
The sm2 local-key-pair command configures the SM2 key pair used to request a certificate in offline mode.
The undo sm2 local-key-pair command deletes the SM2 key pair used to request a certificate in offline mode. The sm2 local-key-pair command configures the SM2 key pair used to request a certificate in offline mode. The undo sm2 local-key-pair command deletes the SM2 key pair used to request a certificate in offline mode. By default, the system does not configure the SM2 key pair used to request a certificate in offline mode.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the SM2 key pair.
The value must be an existing SM2 key pair name.

ExtraInfo: The PKI entity that requests a certificate from the CA using offline PKCS#10 mode must contain a public key. Run this command to configure the SM2 key pair.
